pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Hyperdirichlet Distribution, Mark 2 // A suite of routines for the hyperdirichlet distribution and reified Bradley-Terry; supersedes the 'hyperdirichlet' package; uses 'disordR' discipline doi:10.48550/ARXIV.2210.03856. To cite in publications please use Hankin 2017 doi:10.32614/rj-2017-061, and for Generalized Plackett-Luce likelihoods use Hankin 2024 doi:10.18637/jss.v109.i08.
